Section.Catchline: Guardian forbidden to borrow or purchase; exceptions.

SectionBody.Text: A professional guardian may not purchase property or borrow money from his or her ward. A guardian who is not a professional guardian may do so if:

Subsection.Text: A court by written order authorizes the sale or loan after a hearing to which interested persons were given notice; or
The property is sold at public sale and the guardian is a spouse, parent, child, brother, or sister of the ward or a cotenant of the ward in the property to be sold.
